module.name: IntegerList
module.short: Provides lists for Integer data types implemented using generics

descr.p: The classes provide the same methods and properties for Integer types as provided for Strings in TStringList. They provide an overloaded Sort method to ensure that the specialization types are handled in the methods.

element.name: TByteList
element.short: Implements a specialization of TFPGList for Byte data types

descr.p: TByteList provides an overloaded Sort method to ensure that values in the list are handled using a compare function that operates on Byte values.

element.name: TByteList.Sort
element.short: Sorts the Byte values stored in the list

descr.p: Sort is an overloaded method in TByteList which calls the inherited method using the CompareByte function in the implementation section.

element.name: TWordList
element.short: Implements a specialization of TFPGList for Word data types

descr.p: TWordList provides an overloaded Sort method to ensure that values in the list are handled using a compare function that operates on Word values.

element.name: TWordList.Sort
element.short: Sorts the Word values stored in the list

descr.p: Sort is an overloaded method in TWordList which calls the inherited method using the CompareWord function in the implementation section.

element.name: TCardinalList

descr.p: TCardinalList provides an overloaded Sort method to ensure that values in the list are handled using a compare function that operates on Cardinal values.

element.name: TCardinalList.Sort
element.short: Sorts the Word values stored in the list

descr.p: Sort is an overloaded method in TCardinalList which calls the inherited method using the CompareCardinal function in the implementation section.

element.name: TIntegerList.Sort

descr.p: Sort is an overloaded method in TIntegerList which calls the inherited method using the CompareInteger function in the implementation section.

descr.p: Sort is an overloaded method in TInt64List which calls the inherited method using the CompareInt64 function in the implementation section.
